snippet.title: Kozyrev Horrors Game - Official LaunchTrailer
snippet.description:
Unlock your Extra Sensory Perception in Kozyrev Horrors, a chilling single-player horror game inspired by the Kozyrev Mirrors experiments. Explore a haunting liminal space, uncover disturbing phenomena, and face your fears.

About the Game:

Investigate: Navigate eerie dimensions and encounter mysterious entities.
Survive: Stay alert as sudden noises may attract unknown dangers.
Uncover Secrets: Delve into the disappearance of a colleague and the sinister effects of the Kozyrev Mirrors.
🔗 Get Kozyrev Horrors Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2821830/Kozyrev_Horrors/


👻 Follow us for updates: https://x.com/oliveiragsg

#Horror #IndieGame #UnrealEngine #HorrorGame
